function renderLine(line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c == "o" then oxyd(i-1,line) elseif c == "+" then set_stone ("st-rock1",i-1,line) elseif c == "#" then set_stone ("st-glass1",i-1,line) set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c == "l" then set_stone ("st-oneway-w",i-1,line) set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c == "r" then set_stone ("st-oneway-e",i-1,line) set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c == "=" then set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c == "!" then set_floor ("fl-abyss",i-1,line) elseif c == "X" then set_actor ("ac-whiteball-small",i-0.5,line+0.5,{player=1,mouseforce=0}) set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c == "O" then set_item ("it-tinyhollow",i-1,line,{essential=1}) if difficult then set_floor ("fl-bluegreenx",i-1,line) else set_floor ("fl-red",i-1,line) end elseif c == "a" then set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) set_item ("it-magnet",i-1,line,{name="am"}) elseif c == "b" then set_floor ("fl-space",i-1,line) set_item ("it-magnet",i-1,line,{name="bm"}) elseif c == "A" then set_stone ("st-switch_black",i-1,line,{action="onoff",target="am"}) elseif c == "B" then set_stone ("st-switch_black",i-1,line,{action="onoff",target="bm"}) elseif c == "1" then set_stone ("st-timeswitch",i-1,line,{delay=0.1,action="callback",target="al"}) elseif c == "2" then set_stone ("st-timeswitch",i-1,line,{delay=0.1,action="callback",target="ar"}) elseif c == "3" then set_stone ("st-timeswitch",i-1,line,{delay=0.1,action="callback",target="bl"}) elseif c == "4" then set_stone ("st-timeswitch",i-1,line,{delay=0.1,action="callback",target="br"}) end end end

function al() s1 = 1 - s1 if s1 == 1 then if ap > 1 then ao = enigma.GetAttrib(enigma.GetNamedObject("am"),"on") enigma.KillItem (ap,3) ap = ap - 1 set_item ("it-magnet",ap,3,{on=ao,name="am"}) end end end
function ar() s2 = 1 - s2 if s2 == 1 then if ap < 18 then ao = enigma.GetAttrib(enigma.GetNamedObject("am"),"on") enigma.KillItem (ap,3) ap = ap + 1 set_item ("it-magnet",ap,3,{on=ao,name="am"}) end end end
function bl() s3 = 1 - s3 if s3 == 1 then if bp > 1 then bo = enigma.GetAttrib(enigma.GetNamedObject("bm"),"on") enigma.KillItem (bp,5) bp = bp - 1 set_item ("it-magnet",bp,5,{on=bo,name="bm"}) end end end
function br() s4 = 1 - s4 if s4 == 1 then if bp < 18 then bo = enigma.GetAttrib(enigma.GetNamedObject("bm"),"on") enigma.KillItem (bp,5) bp = bp + 1 set_item ("it-magnet",bp,5,{on=bo,name="bm"}) end end end
